benchmark_details.name: EscapeBench
benchmark_details.overview: EscapeBench is a benchmark suite of room escape game environments designed to challenge agents with creative reasoning, unconventional tool use, and iterative problem-solving to uncover implicit goals. It evaluates language model agents' abilities to creatively adapt and navigate complex scenarios.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate and advance the creativity of language model agents in problem-solving scenarios inspired by room escape games.

data.source: 36 game settings with various difficulty levels inspired by room escape games, manually annotated to ensure high quality.
data.annotation: Manually annotated by eight human annotators with experience in Room Escape games.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the performance of agents over 36 game settings, focusing on hints used and steps taken.
methodology.interpretation: Decreased hints and total steps indicate improved creativity and problem-solving efficiency.
methodology.validation: Performance validated through multiple model evaluations in various game settings.
